urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

tweets.text: üåß Wet weekend for Devon and Cornwall with @AdrianEvansEA explaining what‚Äôs being done to reduce flood risk ‚ö†Ô∏è You can check yours at https://t.co/QdPKdEYx15 https://t.co/03HBjB0spl

We‚Äôre aware of a pollution incident at Layland Beck, which is a tributary of Saltburn Gill near Skelton. 

We‚Äôre currently carrying out an investigation into the source and any impact the substance might have on the environment. https://t.co/Ghmfw4vLlv

It's so sad to see the canal you love polluted by oil and diesel. Watching helplessly as ducks and geese struggle through the slime. It's been like this for five days, worsening, and the cause hasn't been found. #Retweet #PeakForestCanal @BBCNWT @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgency https://t.co/oKzQsGztFK

tweets.text: Work has begun to stabilise a riverbank damaged after the collapse of a weir at Newlay, near Leeds. The damage has not increased the immediate risk of flooding to local properties, but the works are required to prevent any further erosion and longer term flood risk. https://t.co/DJZkw0Ndxb

@suesustainable @EnvAgency I share your frustration Sue and can't wait to get back out and about - I can't speak for EA enforcement which is a different case but I'm afraid the rules are really clear for us in our programme team: we are to stay at home if we can like everyone else!

Oh god, double whammy - pollution event no2 - pumping  polluted water from crushed concrete into #ShuttertonBrook - watched them doing it. I‚Äôm so sick of people abusing the Environment, seems endless and who is monitoring them? @Teignbridge @EnvAgencySW #Dawlish #Devon https://t.co/g9FzlzbLKH
@irishjojo2000 Please contact our National Customer Contact Center on 03708506506. Kind Regards.

There is no need to do farm visits virtually. It is perfectly safe  to be with people outdoors while socially distancing. It is wrong that so many aspects of enforcement (think @EnvAgency ) and contact with farms has been curtailed to the extent it has been due to Covid. https://t.co/Nf1Tu1mAHv
